## detectVSCodeFamily() function

Detect if running in a VS Code family terminal.

Detects VS Code, Cursor, and Windsurf terminals by examining environment variables including TERM\_PROGRAM, \_\_CFBundleIdentifier (macOS), and editor-specific variables like CURSOR\_CLI.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function detectVSCodeFamily(): VSCodeFamilyInfo | null;
```
**Returns:**

[VSCodeFamilyInfo](./chromaterm.vscodefamilyinfo.md) \| null

VSCodeFamilyInfo if running in a VS Code family editor, null otherwise
